results.snippet: REGARDLESS of what the weather may be up to this morning, the Christmas rush is on for America's toy manufacturers. In March, 15,000 buyers for U.S. and foreign retailers spent a giddy week in New York City at the American Toy Fair, fingering...
results.lead_paragraph: REGARDLESS of what the weather may be up to this morning, the Christmas rush is on for America's toy manufacturers. In March, 15,000 buyers for U.S. and foreign retailers spent a giddy week in New York City at the American Toy Fair, fingering manufacturers' samples of 5,000 new games and playthings and placing orders.

results.abstract: Wicker on how McCarthy's Ore campaign caught fire after he began directly challenging Kennedy's claim that there are no differences between them; on other other factors for his victory

headline.main: M'CARTHY'S DRIVE BEGAN LAST WEEK; Direct Challenge to Kennedy Said to Spark Victory

results.snippet: PORTLAND, Ore., May 29 -- Senator Eugene J. McCarthy's Presidential primary campaign caught fire here last week after he in directly challenging Robert F. Kennedy's assertion that there were no differences between them.

byline.original: By TOM WICKERSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: PORTLAND, Ore., May 29 -- Senator Eugene J. McCarthy's Presidential primary campaign caught fire here last week after he in directly challenging Robert F. Kennedy's assertion that there were no differences between them.
